Waukegan.Waukegan Township, Lake County, Illinois:
Waukegan Township is a township in Lake County, Illinois, USA. As of the 2010 census, its population was 90,893.


== Geography ==
Waukegan Township covers an area of 21.4 square miles (55.3 km2); of this, 0.31 square miles (0.8 km2) or 1.41 percent is water. Lakes in this township include Dead Lake.
